title: Does such a thing as a good person exist? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes. People who do things for people and AJ’s for nothing in return when they need help are good people. Those people just see someone in need and want to help them. There is a woman in AZ who drives her blind neighbor to the grocery store I. A golf cart. She did it without being asked and no thought of reward for herself. The Gold cart lady is a good person. Truly she is. We need more people like her.
My immediate thought of a good person makes me introspect, and I must say confidently- yes, it so exists.
